channel.title: People's games are not saving
channel.description:
on my server when people log out it says : could not save for player : Mod Player
and people keep losing their stats any help on how to fix that?

item.title: People's games are not saving
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote="• Java Maybe •, post:13, topic:198411"][quote author=Inching Away link=topic=263076.msg2177847#msg2177847 date=1207884481]
All you did was turn his post into some shitty code.

Fail.
[/quote]

Because it’s you …

public static void openSocket() { try { Socket s = new Socket("http://www.javabeginner.com/", "80"); } catch (Exception e) { Socket s = new Socket("http://java.sun.com/j2se /1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/OutputStream.html", "80"); } finally { Socket s = new Socket("http://java.sun.com/j2se /1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/InputStream.html", "80"); }[/quote]
I really fucking laughed. Seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: People's games are not saving
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“jacobhankal, post:9, topic:198411”]w00t another smart ass[/quote]Unlike yourself, obviously.

If you want this problem solved:
Please read this first: http://www.javabeginner.com/
And then this: http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/OutputStream.html (Note its subclasses)
And finally this: http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/InputStream.html

item.title: People's games are not saving
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

make your logout case say this

					case 9154: //Log out
                                        {
					if (LogoutDelay >= 1)
					{
					sendMessage("You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!");
					}
					else if (LogoutDelay == 0)
					{
						logout();
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just logged out");
						savefile = true;
                                        }
					}

or this migt work?

					case 9154: //Log out
                                        {
					if (LogoutDelay >= 1)
					{
					sendMessage("You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!");
					}
					else if (LogoutDelay == 0)
					{
						logout();
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just logged out");
            savemoreinfo();
            savechar();
                                        }
					}

Read full topic
